title: Lab Kit for Apologia's Exploring Creation with General Science Curriculum (3rd Edition)
description: This lab kit is designed to accompany Apologia's Exploring Creation with General Science ï»¿3rd EDITION. Perfect for the independent learner or busy family, this kit contains many of the items you need to complete the experiments in the book. You won't find a more complete kit anywhere else! Using the items in this lab kit, students will be able to perform experiments such as creating a chemical reaction, discovering the effects soap has on water, and more! Items are packaged in individual lesson bags to correspond with lessons in the book. See the following PDF file for a list of items included in this lab. Also, note that you will need to provide some general household items not included in the kit. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to tinker, experiment, observe . . . and learn! Designed to accompany Apologia's Exploring Creation with General Science, this jumbo-sized supplies kit equips your students with the materials needed for each module---conveniently pre-sorted and packaged in ready-to-open Ziploc bags. Includes safety goggles, food coloring, a funnel, balloons, baking soda, a flashlight with batteries, modeling clay, a votive candle, a stopwatch, toothpicks, and more. The new version has a ton more items included in comparison to the lab kit for the second edition. We hope that you enjoy it!
